```{r setup}
library(data.table) #table
library(stringr) #string wrangling

library(tictoc) #timer
library(profvis) #profiling

##build constants:

## use for bitwise not 
bin_const <- 2^(0:14)

## use for less dyslexia mod errors
modulo <- 32768
magic <- 32776 ## total number of possible locations 

## use for finding opcodes 
opnames <- c(
  "op_00_halt", "op_01_set", "op_02_push",
  "op_03_pop", "op_04_eq", "op_05_gt", 
  "op_06_jmp", "op_07_jt", "op_08_jf", "op_09_add",
  "op_10_mult", "op_11_mod", "op_12_and",
  "op_13_or", "op_14_not", "op_15_rmem",
  "op_16_wmem", "op_17_call", "op_18_ret",
  "op_19_out", "op_20_in", "op_21_noop")

#get commands
raw <- file("./materiel/challenge.bin", "rb")
cmdlist <- readBin(raw, integer(), n = modulo, 
                   size = 2, endian = "little",
                   signed = FALSE)
rm(raw)
```

```{r utility_funcs}
#########
## General-purpose functions

finish <- \(loc, args = 0) { #expect z-indexed
  line <- loc + 1
  doing <<- (line + args)
  memory[(line):(doing), done := TRUE]
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

start <- \(loc) { 
  work <- memory[((loc) + 1):((loc) + 4), cmd]
  work
}

write_loc <- \(value, to = NA) {
  if (is.na(to)) {
    to <- with[1] 
  }
  memory$to <- value
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

pop_stack <- \() {
  stopifnot(length(stack) > 0) 
  x <- stack[1]
  stack <<- stack[-1]
  x
}
```

```{r dispatcheR}
## Controller
#run within while loop for doing < 32768

dispatcheR <- \() {
  work <<- start(doing)
  perform <- work[1]
  if ((length(printqueue) > 0) & 
       (perform == 0 | perform <= 21)) { 
    msg <- c(capture.output(cat
                            (printqueue, sep = "")), 
             paste0(" // ", Sys.time()))
    writeLines(msg)
    loglines <<- append(loglines, 
                        c(" ", "---", " ", msg, " "))
    printqueue <<- c()
  } 
  stopifnot(perform <= 21) #stop for illegal commands
  if (perform == 0) {
    op_00_halt()
  } else {
    with <- work[-1] |> as.list()
    args <- memory[z %in% (with), cmd] |> as.list()
    do.call(what = .subset2(opnames, (perform + 1)), 
          args = args)
  }
  return(invisible(NULL))
}
```

```{r opcodes}
op_00_halt <- \(...) { 
  writeLines(paste0(
    "ALERT :: Halting at z = ", doing, "!"))
  loglines <<- append(
    loglines, c(" ", "---", " ", 
    (paste0(
      "**HALT ::** Program halted by z-index `",
            doing, "`")), " "))
  finish(doing)
  doing <<- modulo
  lfn <- paste0("./logs/xenon_loglines_", 
                     as.integer(Sys.time()), ".md")
  fwrite(list(loglines), file = lfn)
  writeLines(c(
    "Counter set to 32768; execution ended. Default logs...", 
    paste0("...have been saved to ", lfn)))
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_01_set <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  write_loc(value = b)
  finish(doing, 2)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_02_push <- \(...) {
  a <- ..1
  stack <<- append(a, stack)
  finish(doing, 1)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_03_pop <- \(...) {
  val <- pop_stack()
  write_loc(value = val)
  finish(doing, 1)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_04_eq <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  if (identical(b, c)) {
    write_loc(value = 1)
  } else {
    write_loc(value = 0)
  }
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_05_gt <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  if (isTRUE(b > c)) {
    write_loc(value = 1)
  } else {
    write_loc(value = 0)
  }
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_06_jmp <- \(...) {
  a <- memory[z == (..1), cmd]
  finish(doing, 1)
  doing <<- a 
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_07_jt <- \(...) {
  a <- ..1
  b <- ..2
  finish(doing, 2)
  if (isTRUE(a > 0)) {
    doing <<- b
  }
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_08_jf <- \(...) {
  a <- ..1
  b <- ..2
  finish(doing, 2)
  if (a == 0) {
    doing <<- b
  } 
  return(invisible(NULL))
} 

op_09_add <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  got <- (b + c) %% modulo
  write_loc(value = got)
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_10_mult <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  got <- (b * c) %% 32768
  write_loc(value = got)
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_11_mod <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  got <- b %% c
  write_loc(value = got)
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_12_and <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  bits <- bitwAnd(b, c)
  write_loc(value = bits)
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_13_or <- \(...) {
  b <- ..2
  c <- ..3
  bits <- bitwOr(b, c)
  write_loc(value = bits)
  finish(doing, 3)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_14_not <- \(...) {
  b <- as.integer(intToBits(..2))[1:15]
  bt <- b == 0
  bits <- sum(bin_const[bt])
  write_loc(value = bits)
  finish(doing, 2)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_15_rmem <- \(...) {
  b <- read_loc(..2) 
  write_loc(value = b)
  finish(doing, 2)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_16_wmem <- \(...) {
  a <- ..1
  b <- ..2
  write_loc(value = b)
  finish(doing, 2)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_17_call <- \(...) {
  a <- ..1
  finish(doing, 1) 
  stack <<- append(doing, stack) 
  doing <<- a #update doing again to find real destination
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_18_ret <- \(...) {
  if (isTRUE(length(stack) < 1)) {
    loglines <<- append( ## note error.
      loglines, c(" ", (paste0(
      "!!:: `ret` (opcode 18) at `doing` = `",
      doing, 
      "` found an empty stack; calling halt.")), 
      " "))
    op_00_halt()
  } else {
    finish(doing, 0)
    top <- pop_stack()
    doing <<- memory[z == (top), cmd]
  }
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_19_out <- \(...) {
  a <- ..1
  ch <- rawToChar(as.raw(a))
  printqueue <<- append(printqueue, ch)
  finish(doing, 1)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_20_in <- \(...) {
  ti <- Sys.time()
  d <- Sys.Date()
  into <<- ..1
  resume <<- doing
  ofn <- paste0("./logs/saves/", d, 
                "_logs_dump.md")
  sfn <- paste0("./logs/saves/", d, 
                "_memloc_", doing, 
                "_into_", ..1, ".csv")
  msg <- c(paste0(ti, " || Saving logs to `", ofn,
                "` with savefile at `", sfn, 
                "` now."), 
           " ", "...", " ", "PROMPT: ", " ",
           capture.output(cat(printqueue, sep = "")),
           " ", "Resume with `go(action = {command}, write = "
           , into, ", finish = ", resume, ")` to continue!")
  writeLines(msg)
  loglines <<- append(loglines, c(" ", "---", " "), msg)
  fwrite(list(loglines), file = ofn)
  fwrite(memory, file = sfn)
  doing <<- modulo
  return(invisible(NULL))
}

op_21_noop <- \(...) {
  writeLines(".....................")
  finish(doing, 0)
  return(invisible(NULL))
}
```

```{r interact}
go <- \(action = NA, write = NA, finish = NA) {
  if (is.na(write) & !(is.na(into))) {
    write <- into
  }
  if (is.na(finish) & !is.na(resume)) {
    finish <- resume
  }
  if (is.na(write) | is.na(finish)) {
    ergo <- c(" ", "...", 
              "ERROR :: Cannot execute `go(action = ", 
              action, ", write = ", write, 
              "finish = ", finish, "`.")
    writeLines(ergo)
    break
  } else {
    if (length(printqueue) > 0) {
      cat(printqueue, sep = "")
      printqueue <<- c()
    }
    while (is.na(action)) {
      action <- readline(
        prompt = "Enter command...")
    }
    str <- strsplit(action)
    seq <- seq_along(str) - 1
    chs <- lapply(str, charToRaw)
    write_loc(value = chs, to = seq)
    finish(finish, args = 1)
  }
  return(invisible(NULL))
}
```

```{r scratch}
scratch <- \() {
  stack <- c()
  printqueue <- c()
  loglines <- c()

  cmdlen <- length(cmdlist)
  memory <- data.table(
    z = 0:(magic - 1),
    cmd = c(cmdlist, rep(0, (magic - cmdlen))),
    done = c(rep(as.logical(NA), magic)),
    is = c(rep("mem", modulo), rep("reg", 8))
  )
  setkey(memory, z)
}
```

```{r load_save}
restore <- \() {
  if (is.null(sfn)) {
    memory <- file.choose() |> fread()
  } else {
    memory <- fread(sfn)
  }
  setkey(memory, z)
}
```

```{r machin}
challengeR <- \(doing = 0) {
  tic("starting machine...")
  writeLines(paste0("START :: Run starts at ", Sys.time()))
  stopifnot(nrow(memory) >= 1)
  while (doing < 32768) {
    if (isFALSE(length(doing) == 1)) {
      stopmsg <- paste0("STOP :: Error: <doing> is ", doing, 
                 ". Setting to 32768 to exit.")
      loglines <<- append(
        loglines, c(" ", "---", " ", stopmsg))
      writeLines(stopmsg)
      doing <<- modulo
    }  
    dispatcheR()
  }
  fwrite(memory, 
       file = "./logs/xenon_latest_run.csv",
       yaml = TRUE)
  toc()
  writeLines(paste0("STOP :: Run ends at ", Sys.time()))
}
```

```{r coalesce}
doeR <- \(resume = FALSE, play = FALSE, from = NA, action = NA, write = NA) {
  if (resume = TRUE) {
    restore()
  } else {
    scratch()
  }
  if (!is.na(from) & from < modulo) {
    doing <<- from
  } else {
    doing <<- 0
  }
  if (play = TRUE) {
    go(action = action, write = write, finish = from)
  }
  challengeR()
  return(invisible(NULL))
}
```

```{r try_it}
profvis( { doeR() } )
```
